{{Server client function}}

This function gets the variant of a specified vehicle. In GTA SA some vehicles are different for example the labelling on trucks or the contents of a pick-up truck and the varying types of a motor bike. For the default GTA SA variant list see: [[/Vehicle variants.md|Vehicle variants]]

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">int, int getVehicleVariant ( vehicle theVehicle )</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/vehicle.md|vehicle]]:getVariant||setVehicleVariant}}
==Required Arguments==
*'''theVehicle:''' A handle to the [[/vehicle.md|vehicle]] that you want to get the variant of.

==Returns==
On success:
* '''int''': An integer for the first vehicle variant see [[/Vehicle variants.md|Vehicle variants]]
* '''int''': An integer for the second vehicle variant see [[/Vehicle variants.md|Vehicle variants]]
On failure:
* '''bool''': False because the specified vehicle didn't exist

==Example==
<section name="Client" class="client" show="true">
This example tells the person in the vehicle what their vehicle variants are using: getvehvar
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function getMyVehiclesVariant()
    local myVeh = getPedOccupiedVehicle(localPlayer) -- Get the vehicle that they're in
    if (myVeh) then
        local var1, var2 = getVehicleVariant(myVeh) -- Get the info
        outputChatBox("This vehicles variants: "..tostring(var1).." "..tostring(var2)) -- Output the info
    end
end
addCommandHandler("getvehvar", getMyVehiclesVariant)
</syntaxhighlight>
</section>
==Requirements==
